summary: Moves \'Paralyze\' and \'Mass Paralysis\' to the Illusion school and adds two new lower level paralyze spells \'Stun\' and \'Mass Stun\'.
descriptionHtml:
Description
=========
Moves \'Paralyze\' and \'Mass Paralysis\' to the Illusion school and adds 
two new lower level paralyze spells \'Stun\' and \'Mass Stun\'
-Stun - Paralyses the target for 5 seconds (requires 25 Illusion)
-Mass Stun - Paralyses all targets in 40ft for 7 seconds requires (50 Illusion)

Location
=======
All spell tomes can be purchased from Drevis Neloren in The College of Winterhold.

Install
=======
Copy \'Paralysis in Illusion School.esp\' into your Skyrim/Data folder.
Don\'t forget to check the data file in the launcher.

Uninstall
=========
Uncheck the data file in the launcher and delete \'Paralysis in 
Illusion School.esp\' from your Skyrim/Data folder.

Credits
=======
Thanks to:
Bethesda for Skyrim and the CK

Legal
=====
Only vanilla assets were used.
author: Squizzo
